Package edu.ntu.bto.model

Class Project

java.lang.Object
edu.ntu.bto.model.Project
public class Project extends Object
Represents a BTO project with housing units for application. A Project contains details such as the project name, location (neighborhood), two flat types with their unit counts and prices, application open/close dates, the manager in charge, information about HDB officer assignment, and whether the project is visible to applicants.
Author:
SC2002 Assignment Group

  • Constructor Details

    • Project

      public Project(String projectName, String neighborhood, String type1, int unitsType1, double priceType1, String type2, int unitsType2, double priceType2, String openDate, String closeDate, String manager)
      Constructs a new Project with full details.
      Parameters:
      projectName - The project name.
      neighborhood - The neighborhood of the project.
      type1 - The first flat type name.
      unitsType1 - Number of units for the first flat type.
      priceType1 - Selling price for the first flat type.
      type2 - The second flat type name.
      unitsType2 - Number of units for the second flat type.
      priceType2 - Selling price for the second flat type.
      openDate - Application opening date (YYYY-MM-DD).
      closeDate - Application closing date (YYYY-MM-DD).
      manager - The manager identifier (name or NRIC) for this project.

    • Project

      public Project(String projectName, String neighborhood, String type1, int unitsType1, double priceType1, String type2, int unitsType2, double priceType2, String openDate, String closeDate, String manager, int officerSlot, String officer)
      Constructs a new Project with a single flat type (no second type). The second flat type fields are set to defaults (zero units and price, and type2 set to "N/A").
      Parameters:
      projectName - The project name.
      neighborhood - The neighborhood of the project.
      type1 - The flat type name.
      unitsType1 - Number of units for this flat type.
      priceType1 - Selling price for this flat type. * @param priceType1 Selling price for the first flat type.
      type2 - The second flat type name.
      unitsType2 - Number of units for the second flat type.
      priceType2 - Selling price for the second flat type.
      openDate - Application opening date (YYYY-MM-DD).
      closeDate - Application closing date (YYYY-MM-DD).
      manager - The manager identifier for this project. * @param officerSlot Number of officer positions available for this project.
      officer - The officer identifier (name or NRIC) assigned to this project (or "None" if none yet). * @param officerSlot Number of officer positions available for this project.
      officerSlot - Slot for an officer

      Gets the number of remaining officer slots for this project.

    • getOfficer

      public String getOfficer()
      Gets the identifier of the officer assigned to this project.
      Returns:
      The officer's identifier, or "None" if no officer is assigned.

    • setOfficer

      public void setOfficer(String officer)
      Sets the officer for this project and reduces the available officer slots by one.
      Parameters:
      officer - The identifier of the officer to assign to this project.

    • isVisible

      public boolean isVisible()
      Checks if the project is visible to applicants.
      Returns:
      true if the project is visible, false if it is hidden.

    • toggleVisibility

      public void toggleVisibility()
      Sets the visibility of the project to applicants.

    • decrementOfficerSlot

      public void decrementOfficerSlot()
      Decrements the available officer slot count by one. This is typically called when an officer is approved to handle the project.

    • decrementUnitsType1

      public void decrementUnitsType1()
      Decrements the count of units of type 1 by one.

      This method reduces the unitsType1 field by 1. It does not perform any checks for negative values; if unitsType1 is already zero or negative, the resulting value may be less than zero.

    • decrementUnitsType2

      public void decrementUnitsType2()
      Decrements the count of units of type 2 by one.

      This method reduces the unitsType2 field by 1. It does not perform any checks for negative values; if unitsType2 is already zero or negative, the resulting value may be less than zero.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the project, including all its details.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      A multi-line string describing the project name, neighborhood, flat types with units and prices, application dates, manager, officer slot status, assigned officer, and visibility.

    • toStringSingle

      public String toStringSingle()
      Returns a detailed, formatted string representation of the project for a single flat type. The returned string includes: Project name Neighborhood Flat type and number of units with price Application window (open and close dates) Manager name Officer slot number and officer name Visibility flag
      Returns:
      a String containing the project details formatted as: 
       Project: <projectName>
   Neighborhood: <neighborhood>
   Flat Types:
     • <type1> – <unitsType1> units @ $<priceType1>
   Application Window: <openDate> to <closeDate>
   Manager: <manager>
   Officer Slot: <officerSlot> – <officer>
   Visible: <visible>
